text:
As in MID: <20060212231449.GA14884@none.at> on users@httpd.apache.org discussed
the doc of mod_status say:

---
A compile-time option must be used to display the details marked "(*)" as the
instrumentation required for obtaining these statistics does not exist within
standard Apache.
---

But this isn't anymore necessary.
creator: al-bugzillaapache@none.at
